scenario_text.value:
Doesn’t this area seem...messier than it did
before?
Oh yeah, it does! That’s weird...

No! There’s nothing weird about that! Stop
making up stuff to annoy me!

You seem pretty flustered. You’re not hiding
something, are you?

No I’m not hiding anything! I’m upset because
you keep bothering me! Now get out!!!
Hey! You don’t have to push me!

You’re just imagining that things are
messier than before!
